website_summaries.verdict: Provides firm support and great cushioning for kids who are restless sleepers.
pros: Innerspring coils provide plenty of support for growing kids
Plush memory foam layer cushions the body
Good for combination sleepers and tall teenagers
cons: Shorter lifespan of about 5 to 7 years

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for the price point and absolutely no bedbugs.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product for theprice point. I was very surprised at the quality of construction and comfort. This was my first mattress that came in a box so I was skeptical, but was pleasantly surprised. The reviews stating that bedbugs definitely got my attention, however, I didnt understand how they were being introduced during the manufacturing or shipping process so I called the linenspa to get my answer from the horses mouth. Needless to say, I ordered a total of 6 mattresses and all of them came very well packaged and sealed with zero signs of ANY bugs. Do your own research and I believe you will also put those fears to rest.
customer_reviews.author: thad rickard

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: In fact, I've had mattresses that cost $100s of dollars more that aren't nearly as comfortable. It's not too firm, or too soft though I know that's subjective. I generally like a softer mattress and I find it to be noticeably firm, but the memory foam on top gives it a nice bit of squish. A friend who likes super firm mattresses said she thought it was a bit too soft. So, medium firm like the description says. The pic is right after I unrolled it. No issues with decompression, it popped up and completely inflated itself within an hour at most, (it was a hot day) and it arrived clean and in great condition. Ignore the crazy bug reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Lios

customer_reviews.title: Yup.. Bedbugs
customer_reviews.text: A few weeks after purchasing, I started getting a rash, assumed it to be poison ivy. When rash continued, suspected chemical skin reaction and visited these comments and first saw the allegation of bed bugs. I remember thinking it was absolute rubbish, and that I suspected an unknown/unacknowledged chemical irritant was still more likely. About 5 months later and rashes persist... Inspecting the mattress revealed the bugs. So far (I don't know how) it has not yet spread to the rest of the house, but I gotta say it came w/ the bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Justice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for guest rooms, kids, or smaller people
customer_reviews.text: I've been sleeping on this mattress every night for a few months now. It started out as the most comfortable mattress I've ever owned! Recently it's been causing me a lot of back pain and offers no support anymore. It doesn't look like its sinking in in spots, but it doesn't feel like it has the same structure as when I first started sleeping on it. This mattress would probably be perfect for guest rooms, kids, or even smaller/lighter people!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Cool
customer_reviews.text: This is the third linenspa hybrid mattress I've purchased. Okay, first of all, the best part is opening the package, OMG! I feel like a little kid experiencing this amount of joy and glee from just watching the mattress explode out of the plastic. Anyway, very happy with these mattresses, they are comfy. I think they sleep much cooler than a completely memory foam mattress. This is a wonderful buy if you're on a budget!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Nice
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a soft mattress this is the one for you. It's a great choice for young children when you might not want to invest in an expensive mattress at this time and because it will not compress so much with their weight. We are using it for a daybed that we have in our covered lanai, so it serves our purposes because we plan just to be sitting and not sleeping on it. If you have children, they will be amazed how such a flat package expands into a big mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Palapalai

customer_reviews.title: Take a chance I am glad I did.
customer_reviews.text: OMG. I can't believe something this inexpensive was so comfortable. I spent more for the mattress I was replacing. As the old ones were aweful and I saw the price on these were so low. I was really skeptical, but with so many positive reviews I took a chance. I am really glad I did. They are pretty comfortable to begin with. Once I put on my memory foam topper (that was on the old mattress), well it was amazing to say the least. I have 2 twins pushed together to make a king size bed. Between these awesome twin size mattresses and the foam topper your would have no clue this was not a high end king size mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Harper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: If a mattress is too soft I end up with a sore back. If it's too firm it's not comfortable to sleep on and I have to add a pad. This one addresses both problems by being soft on top and firm underneath. I've tried several memory foam mattresses and never found one to my liking. They're too hot and it doesn't take long for them to develop a depression where you sleep. The mattress expanded as advertised and there were no critters included.
customer_reviews.author: JRB

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality not comfortable and not durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought due to reviews and thickness. Very disappointing. Uncomfortable and had to but a four inch memory topper for it. Not good quality. Springs are felt like there’s no padding. The topper helped solve this but should not have had to pay for a topper for a new mattress that claims it has a nice memory foam top. What memory foam? It was so thin and there no cushion. Maybe 1/2 inch thick? Will never buy from them again as this was my second mattress from this company. First one the seams ripped out down the whole side in less than 30 days. Very poor quality. Never again
customer_reviews.author: Dan Rhea

customer_reviews.title: Good bed for guest room
customer_reviews.text: We ordered an XL twin mattress to go with 1/2 the box springs we took off our king-sized bed. The bed is a little bouncy, but comfortable. It's fine for a guest room, but I'd want more foam if I were sleeping on it every day. It's a great buy for the price. When you open the bag, the air is sucked in with a RUSH and the bed expands instantly, but the memory foam takes a bit longer to puff up. It's good enough that I'm ordering a second mattress for the other half of the box springs.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fulmer

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't expect much because this mattress was so cheap but it seems to be pretty good and will fit the bill for the spare bedroom. It came in a box which was different but it did expand thoroughly when removed from the box. Having it come in a box made it much easier to haul around. Once expanded for a couple of days, I laid down on it and it seems pretty comfortable and will suit my small grandchildren nicely. I would recommend it for a spare bedroom for small children.
customer_reviews.author: SQL4Fun

customer_reviews.title: My back is KILLING me!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress because I bought my sister one a year ago and she really likes hers. NOT ME!! My back and knees hurt so bad I can barely move and it's only been 2 nights sleeping on it!! I know I know... you get what you pay for. But with all the good reviews and my sister saying hers is good I thought it was worth a shot. Working a 10 hour shift today is going to really really suck with my back and knees already hurting. :(
customer_reviews.author: TxLnghrnSam

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest mattress, don’t waste your money!!! My son is almost 11 and very tall for his age so we decided to get him a Twin XL, we have had the mattress open for 2 days hoping it would fluff up and it’s still so flat. Also we bought a bed frame for a Twin XL and this doesn’t even come close to fitting. Mattress is supposed to be 80 long, and it’s only 77. I don’t know how I’m supposed to return this? This was vacuum packed and rolled. Terrible terrible purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mom2three

customer_reviews.title: Comfy bed for people on a budget
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mattress. I let it decompress for 2 days and a half and you could tell a difference from when I first opened it. It's firm without it being hard, and the foam adds some plushiness. I wouldn't say it's for people that need to relief any pain per se. It's for someone that wants to have a good (way more than decent) sleep in a comfortable single bed. I have found hotels beds to be too stiff or hard and Casper mattresses to be too soft. And I'll take this one over any other so far, especially at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Kittykat

customer_reviews.title: Cute Bedframe!
customer_reviews.text: I slept great on this bed after the day I built it! The build is extremely sturdy but leaves some space for shoes and stuff underneath. So the only thing I hate about this is it comes in about 100 different parts, and requires a lot of labor during assembly, as well as a few of your own personal tools. The tools that are provided with the frame are sub-par. I would have liked putting it together more if it were with a screwdriver instead of an allen wrech smaller than my fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Doms

customer_reviews.title: Solid Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I have been moving a lot recently and spent $$$ on expensive mattress from big brands and retail store. Because of this pandemic, I decided to try buying a ‘Vacuumed’ mattress for the first time. Surprsingly, this mattress perform as well as mattress that cost $$$. Unfortunately, After you open this packaging, you will need to wait for couple days. Overall, a solid 4 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Steffi

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: If I hadn't gotten rid of my old mattress this would go back first it arrived late. 2ndly this thing causes my back pains as if this is not made to be used without box spring. Like it really has no support
customer_reviews.author: AHenderson

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fully expand
customer_reviews.text: This mattress came clean and sealed. I would give 5 stars but it didn't expand all the way. I talked to their customer service and they did give a partial refund. I am satisfied with I It anyway. It definitely serves its purpose. My father who is paraplegic thinks its comfortable. He has complained about getting hot but over all he likes the mattress. I am thinking about buying this mattress for my child's room cause it is very affordable and the quality it's there. Plus there customer service is GREAT. what else do you need?? Great mattress for a great price, with great service. YES PLEASE.!!!!
customer_reviews.author: J.Bettencourt

customer_reviews.title: No bugs.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is not good for me. Now that being said it’s a very nice mattress for the price. 8inch twinXl. I was in a hurry and bought it when I should’ve bought the 10-12 inch. I weigh about 185 and it’s just not enough for me. Someone lighter or kids it would be perfect. Also no bugs were found. We thoroughly checked it out. I think these people are only saying this to get free mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable that I thought it would be, worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest, I wasn't expecting a whole lot of comfort from a mattress of this size, at this price. I was happily surprised with the level of comfort and ease of use with this mattress. I've never had a Memory Foam mattress and have quickly learned just how warm it stays at night. With my old spring mattress I had to use two or three blankets with a bed sheet, but with this Memory Form top I can only use a bed sheet as it stays just that warm. I went with the Zinus base and they are very comfortable together. Extremely happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: APredator

customer_reviews.title: Took a chance and paid off
customer_reviews.text: My son is a loong way away at college. I wanted to have a bed delivered so we wouldn't have to shop around an unfamiliar city and get shafted. My son is ~175lbs, 6 foot and has been perfectly happy with this bed for three months now. We set the mattess on one of the metal frames, also from amazon with a non-skid carpet pad between the mattress and all is good at college town. expecting to purchase another for my daughter in the next few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely skeptical buying a mattress that's shipped like this. My daughter needed one quickly so I we tried it. For the price you can't go too wrong. It came within a few days. I unfilled it and cut the vacuum seal. It quickly expanded. I let it set 2 days to expand while we went out of town. When we got home we put it on and for the past few weeks she has slept great and is very satisfied with the bed. She's a tall teen around 130lbs and it has had noniszues supporting her!
customer_reviews.author: G. Cinnamon

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 twin XL for guest beds. After researching mattresses and going blind, I just ordered these because of the price, and the fact they weren’t entirely memory foam as that gets too hot in our desert climate. So far all guests who have slept on them have remarked they are surprisingly comfortable. I guess they were surprised because they’re older people used to conventional box spring/mattress set up. They are firm enough for those who like sleeping on a firm mattress, but not so firm that anyone wakes up with a back ache. No smell from unpacking. I let them rise for 2 days prior to anyone sleeping on them. Pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: 1pinktrailer

customer_reviews.title: Quality vs price is exceptional!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mattress for the Peterbilt 387 semi-tractor. We used to purchase mattresses in the $80 range, but those turned out to be rather poor. For $20 dollars more we got comfortable and quality made product. One of my drivers has a $500 custom made mattress. He says his is just slightly better. Overall quality vs price is exceptional. This is a smart buy for fleets needing replacement mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: Victor M

customer_reviews.title: Suprised!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 30ish daughter to have at my house. We put it on top of a futon. She is a heavier gal who has had two back surgeries, so was a little skeptical as to how well the mattress would work for her, but was on a very limited budget. She has slept on it, and was amazed at the comfort. No more back pain than usual sleeping on a much more expensive mattress at her house. We are very pleased with the mattress. My other daughter says she wants one to take to her dorm when she goes back to school in August. Actually, she said she would steal her Sissy's.
customer_reviews.author: LuLu

customer_reviews.title: Not as described...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in July of 2019 and it has been fantastic. I reordered the same mattress and instead got a 6 inch all blue mattress with no memory foam. I've asked for a replacement and I hope they get it right on this next run. I'll add a picture of my good one from July and the 2nd order for this month of November 2019. I'll also post a picture of the replacement when I get it... pictures incoming.
customer_reviews.author: GarbageMan

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I buy it sooner?!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this mattress. From the first night I felt an instant difference from air mattresses. The mattress conforms to your body. The firmness is just right. The best feature is it's cat proof. I've lost so many air mattresses due to my cats. This mattress is durable, easy to set up, and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: F. King

customer_reviews.title: Smells!
customer_reviews.text: Checked it over good for bedbugs as I saw a couple of reviews about that and it worries me but it was clean. My son likes it, it is comfortable and a good price. One star off though because it has a horrible smell which after a week is finally starting to go away. I thought the cat had peed in the room or something it was pretty strong. I sprayed some fabric odor eliminator on it and giving it some time to air out I’m sure it will go away. Other than that no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Ian Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We needed a quick bed and turned to Amazon to locate something quick and low priced. This bed is so comfortable and we were shocked at that! Great bed for the price. We bought a stand on here also to hold it.
customer_reviews.author: Nu Threadz

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got this to sleep on when visiting my son(instead of a very uncomfortable sofa) and was very impressed for the price. It arrived all rolled up (see photo) but unfolded quickly and there was no nasty smell that you sometimes get with this sort of mattress. I slept on it for a couple of weeks on the floor and got a good night's sleep. If I were getting this as a permanent mattress for a bed, I would get the 10" or 12" version which, based on my experience with the 8", would be an excellent mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Helen C. Haislmaier

customer_reviews.title: Bought a full size for my kiddo
customer_reviews.text: It was shipped in one large heavy box in a vacuum sealed heavy-duty plastic. Very clean. No weird smells. Stand back after you pierce the plastic so you don’t get smacked when it unrolls itself. Great quality for the price. I will be buying again if we need a new mattress for ourselves. I tested it out and it’s not super soft but it’s not a hard-form bed. Very supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, cool, restful sleep.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for an extended visit to my daughter’s home in Florida. She didn’t have a lot of space so I ordered a Twin XL. I’m 5’5” 130 lbs and it was perfect. I slept comfortably and never felt hot at all. Reviewing after 30 consecutive restful nights. I prefer a plush but supportive mattress and this one felt great. Highly recommend 😀
customer_reviews.author: jc illinois

customer_reviews.title: Pretty fly for a fat guy
customer_reviews.text: At 270 lbs, I was uncertain if this mattress would prove to be soft or firm. I didn't care which, so long as it didn't feel weird or give me a sore back. I've slept on it two nights so far in my RV, it felt like a normal mattress, my back was fine, I slept great. It has no apparent smell on opening like some mail-order mattresses, so it didn't need to air out except to expand a bit. I wish I'd bought a replacement mattress years ago, and I'm happy this one is proving to be such a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Got for my 14 yr old
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking the bed was going to be thin so I got a XL but I actually could have just gotten a Reg size. My son thought it was going to be small too especially when it came in a box. I explained that the company puts the mattress in a bag and vaccum the air out then roll it up. When we removed the packageing it pop up in to a full size bed. He is very happy says it is comfortable and has no complaints. I tried it too very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Flenoy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable For My Teenager
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 8 inch Twin XL mattress one year ago for my 6'2" 250 pound teenager. The mattress is holding up great and we have had zero problems. I got the frame that matches the bed when I ordered so that may make a difference in comfort. We are so happy for the mattress I have ordered a second one for our other son.
customer_reviews.author: Steve C

customer_reviews.title: Mattress
customer_reviews.text: The price of the LinenSpa 8" Hybrid Mattress was a big consideration in the purchase. The mattress is for a guest bed and it seems to be very comfortable. It is being used on just a bed frame, good support underneath with wooden slates the entire length of the frame. It seems good with plenty of support. This product seems very good especially for such a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and saving mattress
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to have a place for me and my baby take nap, cause she is getting bigger and don't want to sleep on crib matress anymore. It is light weight and soft, easy to open and reform to 8 inches almost right away. It is the saving matress i found which is fit my need. For bug problems like other said, luckily, mine didnot have that.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine P

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: While it is affordable, it is not worth the savings to me. I only get a budget night's sleep with this mattress. I had to add a foam topper to avoid waking up with pain in my shoulder or back (side sleeper). However, I'm 175 lb and have broad shoulders so I could imagine it might be better suited to someone smaller. Might be worth a try for a child's mattress or a lightweight guest bed but, even then I don't think it will last long.
customer_reviews.author: J. Scott

customer_reviews.title: The springs are very strong and hold my size easily. I was worried it may bottom out when ...
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely surprised with this purchase. I bought the Twin XL size. After unpacking it was ready to go. The springs are very strong and hold my size easily. I was worried it may bottom out when I sit on it like a futon, but it stays firm! I am 6'0 and 290lbs and it is very comfortable. So for those of you buying for your kids, rest assured it will be comfortable. Especially if it can hold my big ass. :)
customer_reviews.author: Cephun

customer_reviews.title: Works well with hospital bed foundation
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress to replace a sagging mattress that came with my used hospital bed. My first impression was that it was a big improvement over the old one, but seemed too soft where my hip hit the mattress when I lay on my side. However, it seems to have firmed up a bit as I have used it and I sleep well. I weigh 190 pounds. The bed is adjustable and the mattress has worked very nicely with the bed mechanism. I detected no off gassing and can recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Colandrio

customer_reviews.title: Twin Girl Mom
customer_reviews.text: I bought two twin XLs for my twin 3 year old daughters. I was nervous because they have always slept together on a full mattress with a memory foam topper. We let the mattress air out for 48 hours. They have slept so soundly ever since getting these. I would recommend this mattress to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Omy to seven

customer_reviews.title: Too soft, amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to make my dad comfortable on his home hospital bed. Flexible enough for the bed, my dad's only complaint is that it's too soft. I called customer service, they refunded the money. I'm amazed. No return necessary. I'm shocked, pleasantly surprised. Too bad they don't have a firm version.
customer_reviews.author: lrnbsn

customer_reviews.title: Great price and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about buying a mattress online. It came in and was all rolled up and I was even more skeptical! Then we opened it and let it set... it’s SO COMFY!!!! Very soft and comfortable! The memory foam tends to keep your shape and a “hole” is in the middle from where we sleep but it’s still comfortable! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: KristinL

customer_reviews.title: Great value mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat it for the price. I bought 2 of these in twin XL for my son’s new bunk beds. They would be a little in the soft side for an adult for sure, but to last the next several years they’ll do just fine. They expanded pretty quickly once out of the box. I just poked a couple of holes in the vacuum plastic and watched them expand, pretty neat. The memory foam seems to be good quality. Overall a great product I think.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Torsell

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Bought a "damaged box" and saved $10 at least. Bought it to go into my semi truck...which would've costed me at least $200 for just a regular mattress. This has a memory foam top and is actually a way better mattress and a lot more comfortable on my back. To me....it was a no brainer. Saved big bucks over a regular truck mattress, PLUS a few more dollars saved because the original shipping box was damaged. Amazon did it again. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: timothy sharp

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 2 received one damaged and one good mattress
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 2 mattress one was very good worth it but the other one came damaged and found some bug coming out of it and more worst is it cost more expense to return it back then the cost of mattress its all depend on luck if you receive it good you r lucky and recieved it bad or damage then you have no choice...
customer_reviews.author: Zaid shaikh

customer_reviews.title: Great steal!
customer_reviews.text: These are firm! I would rate the Scale of firmness out of ten probably a 7. It’s super cozy I have back issues so I can’t have something too soft! I used a xl twin and queen to make a sectional and my favorite part is how comfy they are. It’s been a little over a month not seeing any issues. I did let them rest after opening a full 24 hrs. These are a great affordable option honestly sad I didn’t have these options Years ago. I plan on purchasing another for my room!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for my teenager son. He said it is very comfortable and sleeps well on it. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant Surprise
customer_reviews.text: I needed three mattresses pronto. This was the right price, and it came earlier than expected. It was vacuum-packed and rolled so the packaging was easy to get to my second floor. It is heavy so if you can't lift heavy objects, get help. After opening, I gave them the recommended time to fully restore to their regular size. I dressed them and have been sleeping quite well since then. I love the way it hugs me when I lay down. I bought the 8 inch with the intention of purchasing a 1.5 to 3 inch topper, but a month later there is still no need.
customer_reviews.author: AbbiMichele

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: It's only been day 1 and the mattress isn't for me but my kid we needed a mattress for his big boy bed. I have been looking at this on for a bit and finally decided to try it out and I'm so glad I went with this mattress it's so comfortable I just hope he thinks so too.
customer_reviews.author: kflynn82

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Not only was this super fun to get in the mail, and watch it expand in front of us, but it was the nicest new mattress for my mother's hospital bed! I got the 8-inch thick version, and I'm glad I did because the 10in would have been too high for her to even get into the bed. She had a great night sleep and reports less pain, and for the price, I couldn't ask for more. Except I DID get something more: I got it a day early! Thank you, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: You’re getting more than you bargained for. Superior quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: This mattress negates the entire idea of even being slightly ok with paying thousands for a mattress. Amazing quality for something so practically usable and enjoyable just minutes after unpackaging. Getting great sleep shouldn’t mean vacating peace of mind from making a wise purchase that’s worth the money. Will recommend this to anyone out there. A great mattress that is absolutely positively worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: AVO

customer_reviews.title: No bed bugs
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a mattress and bed frame set. This is exactly that. Much cheaper than most options and seems to be good quality
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, I very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth LinenSpa mattress i've bought. Super comfortable, I very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Best Twin Mattress I've Slept On!!!
customer_reviews.text: The mattress arrived with no damage to the packaging, and looked fine. I appreciated the whimsically written instructions and it was super easy to prepare. The mattress popped up with no issue. I sleep so comfortably on this mattress and I love that it doesn't have that coily feeling/ sound when you move about on the bed like some of the other mattresses in this price range have. It truly feels like a much more expensive mattress so I think this is the most valuable one out there if you're looking for something cheap :)
customer_reviews.author: alexander jung

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, comfy mattress lasts 1 year.
customer_reviews.text: I just needed a place to sleep, and this worked extremely well for almost a year. I'm in bed more than most, so you can expect this mattress to last a year or so. I really enjoyed it, it worked well just on the floor, then on a frame.
customer_reviews.author: JackalSwitch

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the twin xl for $99 and it’s honestly the best purchase ever. It came super quickly and was ridiculously easy to unbox and set up, it took maybe an hour to fully decompress. I’m a teen athlete and my back is wrecked but this bed is suuuuper comfortable! The spring provides an amazing firmness while the top section is soft as a cloud! I definitely don’t regret ordering this, it was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: O

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else.
customer_reviews.text: Never did expand to full height. Have no idea why I ordered this with springs. I was warned but others liked it. Springs are easily felt. Sorry I got this.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Mostly happy!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived clean and "fluffed" itself out properly. It's very comfortable to lay on. My only complaint is that it feels like it wiggles when I move around. Like if this was a car, the shocks kinda suck lol. I did get the twin size so a larger one might be different. Happy with the purchase for the price though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst mattress I even bought
customer_reviews.text: I am changing my review from 5 star to 1 star.. I got three of them.. one twin and one twin xl and one full... Two of them got sink in the middle of the bed.. when I sleep either one,my back hearts in the morning and whole day.. so we all give up sleeping in these mattresses... very very frustrated...
customer_reviews.author: melih seref aslan

customer_reviews.title: Good Mattress for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Got this when we needed a mattress for our nephew last minute. It came on time and expanded out nicely when opened. He says it sleeps great and seems to be happy with it. It is a top of the line mattress? No. It is great for a kid though or a guest bedroom and the price reflects that.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Leister

customer_reviews.title: never ordered a mattress in a box before
customer_reviews.text: But it was easy and they popped open and soon enough they seemed fully inflated. I ordered a 3 inch foam topper to put on top of 2 of these mattresses and now I have a fabulous, King sized bed that is as comfortable as any bed I've ever slept in.
customer_reviews.author: Ilga

customer_reviews.title: Mattress in a box, very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient shipping in box. Nice mattress to replace old hospital bed mattress. Very nice quality, firm but cozy. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but still pretty great :)
customer_reviews.text: The first night I slept on this bed I woke up with lots of back pain. But every night since I have woken up with no pain. Now I just struggle getting out of bed because I'm comfy lol. I had to take away one star because the springs will buckle under the pressure of a knee and snap back really loudly, making me briefly afraid that I've broken it, which is annoying when having to maneuver across the bed. I'm still happy with my purchase and would recommend it... Especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Not fully decompressed and defect spot
customer_reviews.text: This is an ideal size bed but for some reason I feel the bed isn't fully inflated? Or decompressed? Whatever you wanna call it lol. It doesn't seem to be very comfy and the very end has a extremely low spot where there's no support. Overall I can't say it's a bad deal for under 200 bucks but without the imperfections/defects would be nice...
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky
customer_reviews.text: Used this for our kids bed, it squeaks alot. Try sneaking out of the bed ahen the kid falls alseep, just to have them wake right back up because the mattress makes a bunch of noise.....
customer_reviews.author: Tony C.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver for my back! I was on a full.memory foam mattress and it hurt my back, but this one has a proper balance of support and comfort. This is honestly the best and I've ever owned. Mind you, I've mainly owned cheap junk.
customer_reviews.author: Jameson Meylar

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bed! I was nervous buying a mattress online before I could feel it, but it was going to be a spare bed for visitors, so I said what the hey!! Turned out to be a great buy! I sometimes find myself going in there to lay down and relax! Also, I definitely recommend getting the Twin XL for the extra 5inches in length.
customer_reviews.author: Wilhelmina Schroder

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Well I'm pretty happy with this mattress. I got the 8 inch twin xl. I'm 311lbs 6.1 bed is good for me. I was sleeping on a futon for 2 years I could feel every bar. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Helper

customer_reviews.title: BAD BACK? Buy this mattress.
customer_reviews.text: A+...When they quit making mattress's that you can't flip, (I QUIT BUY THEM). Beside, mattress's are to high in price anyway! But I was in need of one and I saw this Memory Foam mattress and the video on it, I thought I'd try it. WOW, very nice mattress. When I first sit on it I thought, oh no to soft. But when I layed down, omg it felt so good on my bad back. First night sleeping on it, fantastic. I love it! :)
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: No!! Don't waste you're money!
customer_reviews.text: No, No, No! Breaks down FAST! Use a matress cover because the least little thing stains the material, body oils/sweat through the sheets (it'll look like you peed the bed) bought for my son a few months ago and after a month or so he was complaining of back and neck pain and sleeping on the couch and we had to replace this matress. Its cheap, yes.. But you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Angel V.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, no issues
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for our guest room, we live in a small apartment and I was pleased with how they were packaged, they were compact, and unfurled as expected. I haven't actually spent the night on them but I tried them out for a few minutes and they seemed fine, my guests slept OK. I put them onto box springs that we already had. I bought mattress protectors for them to keep them nice and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Janette Bowler

customer_reviews.title: Great twin xl mattress for the price. Very comfortable for 8” bed. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and was easy to open. We let it sit around 30 hours and it was good to go. My son loves it and it is really comfortable. I am impressed. Also I did not get the bed bug version so can’t speak about that.
customer_reviews.author: Gunter1

customer_reviews.title: Very firm! You’ll be uncomfortable if you like soft beds.
customer_reviews.text: Just got my mattress two days ago. Seems like a quality product but it’s so uncomfortable. Very firm! I’m annoyed that I need to buy an additional pillow topper now because it’s painful to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Finn

customer_reviews.title: too many brown spots
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really get a chance to see if the bed was any good. The product stated that there would be brown specks but this was more than I bargained for. The entire outside of the bed was brown, grey or otherwise discolored. the thought of paying to sleep on a mattress that looked like that was just too much to bear.
customer_reviews.author: DAWN

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our son, who is living off campus for the first time. Needed a bed that wasn’t terribly expensive. He loves it! Extremely comfortable. Love that it some sin the XL twin size so his dorm sheets still fit. As long as it lasts a year, it will be money well spent. Bought the metal frame, and his empty luggage stores beautifully underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Just a temporary solution to the overall symptom
customer_reviews.text: After a little over 12 months I can say this was not worth the money. A mattress at the very least should last a few years minimum half a decade. The foam on this thing is a joke. It wore off and now all I feel is the springs which have given me nothing but body pain no matter what position I lay. Save yourself the money and get you a real good mattress. I regret buying this for it was only a temporary solution.
customer_reviews.author: VicDz

customer_reviews.title: Needed.
customer_reviews.text: My son is gross. He has ruined several mattresses in a year. I needed something cheap, and delivered. Looked great out of the box. Looks a little flat now. But, I am OVER buying him an expensive mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Chicken mom

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Well packaged and shipped in a relatively small box. Very comfortable. Seems like a few reviews about the mattress having bugs are what prevent an overall 5 star rating. Didn’t have anything like that, and based on the way the mattress is packaged I can’t see how that would even be possible. Happy with the purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David Gray

customer_reviews.title: NO BEDBUGS COMPLETELY CLEAN
customer_reviews.text: i dont know why there are negative reviews on this mattress or mentions of bedbugs. the mattress arrived whistle clean, packaged tight in plastic. my son loves it. he’s 17 and tall; we got the twin xl. im not sure it will last for years and years, but he prefers it to the $1000 pillowtop sealy he had been sleeping on. i consider this a win.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L Dietz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Comes so folded up that you don't even think the box has a whole mattress! Very nice and comfortable. Writing this review after several months of using it. Two of my housemates used it as well and everyone likes it. Comfortable, doesn't give any pain back. The mattress is firm, yet soft. Would highly recommend. P.S. I use it with a mattress cover, so it is still very clean as if still newly bought.
customer_reviews.author: Nozanin

customer_reviews.title: Space age technology, old-fashioned comfort
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe the technology. The last time I bought a mattress in person (from IKEA) it had to be aired for days and expanded very slowly. This one immediately assumed a boxy shape while emitting hilarious sounds, aired out in a couple days, was very comfortable for my tall son, and fit just right onto the Zinus Smartbase twin XL bedframe. No need for box springs (built in).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as reported
customer_reviews.text: This mattress hasn't been as good as the reviews state. While it has helped my wife's back pain, mine is worse than ever before. The product quality isn't good at all, very cheaply made. Within months, there are wires sticking out the underside of the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best. Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Best. Mattress. Ever. If it wasn't for the damn heatwave we're having, I wouldn't get out of bed at all. Its comfortable in all the right spots. Lower back pain, GONE. But it's not just the mattress that gives you comfort, its also having the right pillow to complement it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C Maddox

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son thinks this bed is very comfortable. It is not thick, but the springs combined with the memory foam provide a lot of support. I did not have a problem with any chemical odors, nor were there any kind of insects on it as a previous reviewer stated. It is worth the $100 and is great for a teenager or younger child.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably Priced Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for her college dorm room. I was a little disappointed that the mattress didn't arrive in a box - it was just vacuum sealed and wrapped in plastic. Luckily, there wasn't any damage to the mattress itself. My daughter said the mattress is very good quality, but just a little too firm for her liking.
customer_reviews.author: gapeach79

customer_reviews.title: Really like this mattress
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 3 twin xl Linenspa mattresses for newly built bunkbeds. We were skeptical about the compressed mattresses in a box. However, the system works well. They quickly unfold when you open them. They are wonderful!!! Work well for kids or adults. Are very comfortable, reasonably priced and we are recommending them to others. Would order them again.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca5000

customer_reviews.title: Bed bug issue is a bunch of B.S. with a capital B
customer_reviews.text: I can't imagine someone writing such a ridiculous review,it is solid (not hard) very comfortable,the reviews claiming bed bugs composers should be banned from writing reviews, STUPID!
customer_reviews.author: Danis M. Whiles

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive! Don't buy a  mattress at a store for 3 times the cost!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress I purchased for my son is so totally better than my $400 mattress, it's ridiculous. Don't be worried about buying a mattress online; this will impress the heck out of you. The Linenspa feels like you're sleeping on a layer of cooling gel. It's definitely not firm, in my opinion. Yet it still feels supportive. I would say it's soft to lightly firm. My son loves it and now I have to figure out how to swipe it from him. One last thing: The Twin XL is a little short. My son is 6'6" and his feet still stick out to his ankles.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.

customer_reviews.title: One word!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! First of all it was delivered ahead of schedule, 2nd this mattress is great quality and super comfortable. Get it! You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: dianne m

customer_reviews.title: Comfy for what it is!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable for what it is. My hubbys hips did start hurting after a few nights. It's a pretty thin mattress. The thicker one might be better. But for the price, it makes a great spare or a guest bed!
customer_reviews.author: Our Family

customer_reviews.title: If you need to buy a cheap mattress look no further.
customer_reviews.text: I've been sleeping on this item for almost two months. I have the twin XL. I use it as a bed in a small apartment and I enjoy sleeping on it. I never wake up with a sore back or wishing a I had a better mattress. For a cheap mattress that comes in a small box you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelWojcicki

customer_reviews.title: #noregrets
customer_reviews.text: The bed could be a little more comfy I think. Luckily I have a 3" mattress topper that makes this super comfy, but I wanted to try it without and thus the three star comfort rating. Awesome price tho couldn't resist and I don't regret my decision at all. Can't beat free two day shipping on a friggin bed
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Good product for price
customer_reviews.text: I got this matress for the top bunk of a bunk bed for my 5 year old to sleep on. I was shocked by the good quality of this matress, it is just what we needed. I was a bit worried when it came rolled up and vacuum sealed; this actually made it easier to get up our narrow steep staits.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this mattress, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: It does take up to 48 hours to breathe and expand fully. It does go faster when it's particularly warm in that room. No back pain, which I did have with my old mattress, comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Lyz

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress for my teenage son's old mattress. He's extremely satisfied with the comfort. The quality is great and the price is amazing. I'll be replacing my other children's mattress with this as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jord Soro

customer_reviews.title: Dips in the middle
customer_reviews.text: Listen after two months, it started to loose it's shape in the middle. Bought for my young adult son for his first apartment. Super soft but we've already bagged it up.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: Firmer than expected, but a good mattress.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed mattress mainly because my last one was a hand-me-down, and it was too big for my room. This popped up as a best seller suggestion, and the reviews looked fair and reasonable to give it a try for it's price. While it's a bit more firm than I was expecting, I find the mattress working very well for me. It took some getting used to it, but I am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Tobey

customer_reviews.title: No sleep
customer_reviews.text: Even though it’s a hybrid, it’s bouncy. Comfort level zero and sometimes my back hurts a lot. Also I don’t get sound sleep on this. Sometimes i wake up because of the discomfort. Buy a memory foam instead, don’t fall for this cheap version.
customer_reviews.author: Omkar Awate

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. I added a total of 2-3” blue swirl memory foam toppers (1 topper per side) and secure them with bamboo waterproof mattress protectors on each side so the mattress can be flipped regularly. The whole cost of the mattress, toppers, and protectors was less than store prices so I’m happy!
customer_reviews.author: Tallgirl

product_meta.title: Linenspa 8 Inch Memory Foam and Innerspring Hybrid-Mattress - Medium-Firm Feel - Twin XL
product_meta.description: Size:Twin XL| Style Name:8 Inch Mattress OnlyAdd the pressure point relief of memory foam to the reliable support of a traditional spring mattress, and you have the revolutionary comfort of the hybrid mattress. A layer of memory foam is quilted in the soft, knit cover and placed over a 1.5 inch layer of comfort foam to create an incredibly comfortable sleep surface. The foam conforms to the unique curves of your body to minimize pressure points. Beneath the foam top, 6 inch steel coils offer the support and durability of a spring mattress. This design distributes body weight to contour and support as you sleep. The spring layer provides the traditional bounce many like in an innerspring mattress, and improves the breathability of the mattress. This mattress is rolled and shipped in a box for convenient delivery and setup. Simply take the box to the proper room, Carefully remove packaging, and watch as the mattress expands to its true size. This mattress comes with a 10 year U.S. warranty that guards against manufacturer defect.
feature_bullets: 8 inch hybrid mattress combines hypallergenic memory foam with the traditional support of an innerspring mattress for a medium-firm feel perfect for kids rooms, guest beds, or an affordable low-profile option
A plush layer of memory foam helps align the spine to minimize pressure points for increased comfort
Finished with a cozy knit cover, this mattress is compressed as a bed in a box for convenient delivery and setup
Available in a medium-firm 8-inch profile, a medium 10-inch profile, or a plush 12-inch profile that also features gel infusions and individually encased coils
Packaging process may leave small brown flecks called carbons in the mattress packaging; These carbons are harmless pieces of plastic and will not stick to your mattress; 10-year limited warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars36,636 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
